attributes.title: No. This app killed my cat😖
attributes.review:
A little message for TrUmPy ThE SKUNK🦨🙈🤗 and others who not the need for this app. Please don’t download it😔 little did I know how much would be taken from me before I did😖when I first downloaded the app, it took forever to download. And I mean FOREVER by 2 HOURS! When I finally opened the app, my little baby sunshine ☀️ cat was laying on my stomach.🐱😍 he was sleeping like a little angel that fell from heaven when I opened the app. A HORRIBLE GLITCH came over my phone and it made a SCARY HISSINg noise. The glitch came to an image of Trump and his Publicist sitting cross legged in the middle of the Swastika wearing robes with goat head headdresses🐐👺they were chanting in some unknown satanic language before standing up and dancing around a dead mouse.👹💀👽 suddenly my angel baby cat was awake, but his eyes didn’t show the same angel baby light that I loved, his eyes clouded and he began flailing his little legs....😣 as TRUMPY chanted, my darling kitten ran frantically around my house, while frothing at the mouth and breaking furniture 😟 The CHANTING TURNED INTO SCREAMING 😱and my darling ☀️Sunshine Angel 👼🏼 Baby 🍼 Cat 🐱 JUMPED THROUGH THE GLASS OF MY WINDOW😖😫😩..... and proceeded to get himself plastered to the tire of a car 😭😭😰 the chanting ended.... and proceeded to a musical montage of 🥕 man dancing to music: 
🎶I😈PUT👹A🤑SPELL💀ON👄YOuuuUUU 🎵 
I haven’t seen my beautiful cat ❄️ since😭 I loved him so much😔 RIP angel baby sunshine kitten 🐱 

I recommend you don’t get this app unless you want to be cursed.
